name: Spider-Man (MCU) Collection
overview: Peter Parker, an academically gifted but socially inept high school student, fights crime as Spider-Man, a member of The Avengers.

parts.overview: Following the events of Captain America: Civil War, Peter Parker, with the help of his mentor Tony Stark, tries to balance his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens, New York City, with fighting crime as his superhero alter ego Spider-Man as a new threat, the Vulture, emerges.
parts.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

parts.overview: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they will hardly be able to rest - Peter will have to agree to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of creatures that cause natural disasters and destruction throughout the continent.
parts.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home

parts.overview: Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
parts.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home

parts.overview: It’s been 3 years since the world had forgotten Peter Parker, but Spider-Man lives on. As his secret identity takes a backseat in his life, the wall crawler has kept the city safe from rising crime, all under the constant scrutiny of those who believe he’s a menace. But as a new day emerges, so too does the evil that threatens an all out war. Now, Spider-Man must face villains, both old and new, alongside unexpected allies, as he comes face-to-face with the ghosts of a past that have haunted him since that fateful night 3 years ago.
parts.title: Spider-Man: Brand New Day
